data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Sangrur.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sangrur, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,616,910 lost people in  Sangrur, Punjab, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sangrur, Punjab, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sangrur, Punjab, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sangrur, Punjab, India.

Jesus, I pray that all the Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions) people is yours.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Sangrur, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Sangrur to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sangrur, Punjab, India has a population of 1,655,200.

We estimate Sangrur has 18,207 people who might know Jesus, 20,083 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,616,910 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Sangrur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
